entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
